function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conflicting and minute guidelines from governments and chain owners creating challenges for food restaurant franchisees in implementing COVID-19 reopening protocols.","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance and potential spread of contagious diseases within restaurant establishments.","Mitigation":"Regular training and updates on guidelines, and the implementation of clear and uniform protocols to ensure consistent compliance.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for training and communication, and contactless service solutions to minimize transmission of diseases.","People":"Food restaurant franchisees, employees, and customers.","Owner":"Government authorities, chain owners, and franchise management."},{"Description":"Adoption of creative tinkering by firms in various industries due to the constraining nature of regulations.","Impact":"Potential for untested or unregulated practices in the context of COVID-19, leading to increased risk of disease transmission and public health concerns.","Mitigation":"Encouraging collaboration between regulatory authorities and industry stakeholders to develop safe and compliant alternative solutions, and conducting thorough risk assessments before implementing creative strategies.","Technologies":"Digital collaboration platforms for industry and government stakeholders, and monitoring technologies for evaluating the impact of alternative business practices on disease transmission.","People":"Firms in various industries, regulatory authorities, and public health agencies.","Owner":"Industry associations, regulatory bodies, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Proactive adoption of drive-in screening options by cinema theatres in response to COVID-19 regulatory constraints.","Impact":"Potential for increased social legitimacy and economic sustainability, but also the risk of insufficient safety measures and crowd management at drive-in venues.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict safety protocols at drive-in screening venues, including capacity limits, social distancing measures, and contactless service options.","Technologies":"Online ticketing and reservation systems, surveillance and monitoring technologies for crowd management, and digital communication tools for safety announcements.","People":"Cinema operators, employees, and attendees at drive-in screening venues.","Owner":"Cinema management, regulatory authorities, and event planning organizations."}]}
